column2: VARDESC
I WANT TO QUIT SMOKING:  Because I am concerned that I will suffer from a serious illness if I don't quit smoking
I WANT TO QUIT SMOKING:  To show myself that I can quit smoking if I really want to
I WANT TO QUIT SMOKING:  So that my hair and clothes won’t smell
I WANT TO QUIT SMOKING:  Because my spouse, children, or other person I am close to will stop nagging me if I quit
I WANT TO QUIT SMOKING:  Because I have noticed physical symptoms that smoking is hurting my health
I WANT TO QUIT SMOKING:  Because I will like myself better if I quit smoking
I WANT TO QUIT SMOKING:  So that I will save money on smoking-related costs such as dry cleaning
I WANT TO QUIT SMOKING:  Because someone has given me an ultimatum (made a threat) to quit
I WANT TO QUIT SMOKING:  Because I can graphically picture the effects that smoking has on my body
I WANT TO QUIT SMOKING:  So that I can feel in control of my life
I WANT TO QUIT SMOKING:  Because I won’t burn holes in clothing or furniture
I WANT TO QUIT SMOKING:  Because I will receive a special gift if I quit
I WANT TO QUIT SMOKING:  Because I have known other people who have died from serious illnesses that were caused by smoking
I WANT TO QUIT SMOKING:  Because quitting smoking will prove that I can accomplish other things that are important to me
I WANT TO QUIT SMOKING:  Because I want to save money that I spend on cigarettes
I WANT TO QUIT SMOKING:  Because people I am close to will be upset with me if I don’t quit
I WANT TO QUIT SMOKING:  Because I am concerned that smoking will shorten my life
I WANT TO QUIT SMOKING:  To prove to myself that I am not addicted to cigarettes
I WANT TO QUIT SMOKING:  So that I won’t have to clean my house or car as often
I WANT TO QUIT SMOKING:  Because I will receive a financial reward for quitting (money from a friend or family member, bonus from work, etc.)
